author: Hannah Ryan
title: This Refugee Business Owner Had Made A Life In Australia. Then The Coronavirus Hit.
description: Labor has called on the government to ensure temporary visa holders in Australia — including refugees and asylum seekers — can access financial support in the pandemic. View Entire Post ›
content:
Things were going well for Arad Nik when the coronavirus outbreak changed everything.
He had fled his native Iran in 2012, after being jailed and tortured over his advocacy for an ethnic minority. In Australia, he was detained for months, and then released w… [+5445 chars]
